column1: I think its wrong that only one company makes the game Monopoly::Steven Wright
My therapist says I have a preoccupation with vengeance X We'll see about that::Steward Francis
The worst time to have a heart attack is during a game of charades::Demetri Martin
When you look like I do it's hard to get a table for one at chuckee cheese::Zach Galifianakis
I don't want to be a member of a club that would have me as a member::Groucho Marx
